summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from February 6, 2015, to February 28, 2015. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and other financial activities related to the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $50.00 on February 6, 2015.
A total of $210,000.00 was deposited into the account on February 9, 2015.
The account had an ending balance of $0.00 as of February 28, 2015, after a withdrawal of $210,000.00.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
